text: Aza walii ta zanugi pɛ seɠeni, niiti ti ɠɛni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ma naavolo makɛsuʋɛ, ta masagi ná-pɛlɛi wu, é ti ve ná-botiɠɛ nu wolaiti zea. Naa ʋoluma é ti leʋe Siili masagi Ɓɛne-Ɠadade ma, nii é ɠɛni zeini Damase, Taɓalimon ná-doun zunui, é ɠɛ mɔnɔ ga Ɠeziyon ná-dounloin, é ɠɛni naa ma,
